description: This file defines data models for assessments within a system, using Pydantic for data validation and serialization. It includes base models for shared assessment fields, as well as specialized models for creation, updating, reading, and listing assessments.

classes.name: AssessmentBase
classes.description: Base model containing shared fields for assessments, such as title.

classes.name: AssessmentCreate
classes.description: Model used for creating a new assessment, inherits shared fields from AssessmentBase.

classes.name: AssessmentUpdate
classes.description: Model used for updating an assessment, allows optional updating of the title.

classes.name: AssessmentRead
classes.description: Model representing an assessment for response purposes, includes identifier and timestamps.

classes.name: AssessmentListResponse
classes.description: Envelope model for list responses containing multiple assessments.
